title: Quinoa with Carrot and Mint
directions: Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the onion and carrot and cover the saucepan. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables soften, about three minutes.

Add the quinoa and stir well. Add the broth and salt and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium-low and cover the saucepan again. Simmer until the quinoa is tender and has absorbed the liquid 20 to 25 minutes. (Some liquid can remain.)
Remove from heat and let it stand, covered, for five minutes. Drain in a wire sieve, if necessary.
Add the mint and fluff the quinoa with a fork. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 tbsp. (15 mL) unsalted butter or extra virgin olive oil
1 cup (250 mL) quinoa, rinsed well under cold water, sieved, drained
2 tbsp. (30 mL) finely chopped fresh mint
